Package com.company

Class BookingApp

java.lang.Object
com.company.BookingApp
public class BookingApp
extends java.lang.Object
The central class for the program. Contains the main method, initialises data and runs the menu. It also features methods for listing Assistants, AssistantOnShifts, Rooms, BookableRooms and Bookings

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      The main method initialises all data and runs the runMenu method. It first initialises the BookingApp and UniversityResources, then initialises the university's data before running the menu.
      Parameters:
      args - arguments for the main

    • updateBookings

      private void updateBookings()
      Update the status of each booking- this happens every time the menu is run.

    • runMenu

      public void runMenu()
      The menu allows the user to select an option for managing COVID tests. Options vary from managing bookable rooms, assistants on shifts, and bookings.

    • manageMenuInput

      private void manageMenuInput​(java.lang.String input)
      Runs a method based on the option the user chose in the runMenu method
      Parameters:
      input - The option the user chose in the menu

    • initialiseBookableRooms

      private java.util.ArrayList<BookableRoom> initialiseBookableRooms()
      Initialises BookableRooms
      Returns:
      rooms the bookable rooms that have been initialised

    • initialiseAssistantsOnShift

      private java.util.ArrayList<AssistantOnShift> initialiseAssistantsOnShift()
      Initialises the AssistantOnShifts.
      Returns:
      assistants -a list of the assistants on shifts

    • initialiseBookings

      public java.util.ArrayList<Booking> initialiseBookings()
      initialise the bookings
      Returns:
      bookings -the list of bookings

    • clearScreen

      public static void clearScreen()
      Clears the screen in the terminal.

    • pressAnyKeyToContinue

      private void pressAnyKeyToContinue()
      Allows for pauses in the program by requiring the user to press enter to continue. It also uses the clearScreen method to clear the screen when called

    • listBookings

      private void listBookings()
      List the bookings- the user is given several options of how they would like to view the bookings as well. They can see all the bookings, just scheduled bookings, or just completed bookings.

    • listAssistantsOnShift

      private void listAssistantsOnShift()
      List the assistants on shifts.

    • listBookableRooms

      private void listBookableRooms()
      List all bookable rooms, or just available ones if the user would prefer.

    • listAssistants

      public void listAssistants()
      List the assistants in the system.

    • listRooms

      public void listRooms()
      Lists the rooms in the system.
